name: Hero V.A
description:
Hero V.A is a Personell assistant.

The file above contains the code for the project. You still need to download the software listed below, through the python site:

  • pyttsx3
  • Visual studio code
  • Voice recognition for python
  • Webbrowser
  • wikipedia
  • playsound

this may seem like a lot of software but in reality it should take approximately 5 - 15 min to download and set up.
